sentences.en: "Morris" is an English corruption of "Moorish", meaning North African.
sentences.cn: Morris在英语中是Moorish的变体，意思是“北非的”。

sentences.en: A South African television report said the ship was ablaze from stem to stern.
sentences.cn: 南非一则电视新闻报道称，那艘船从头到尾都着了火。

sentences.en: Fish is a staple in the diet of many Africans.
sentences.cn: 鱼是很多非洲人饮食中的主食。

sentences.en: He'd been mandated by the West African Economic Community to go in and to enforce a ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 他受西非经济共同体的委托介入并执行停火协定。

sentences.en: It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented towards Europe.
sentences.cn: 看来北非经济体几乎注定还将以欧洲为主导。

sentences.en: Lime preserved in salt is a north African speciality which is used to flavour chicken dishes.
sentences.cn: 盐渍的酸橙是北非的一种特产，在烹制鸡肉时用来调味。

sentences.en: Nigeria provided a large contingent of troops to the West African Peacekeeping Force.
sentences.cn: 尼日利亚向西非维和部队派遣了一大批军队。

sentences.en: The ANC are attacking rugby because it is the soft underbelly of South African sport.
sentences.cn: 橄榄球运动在“非国大”受到抨击，因为它是南非体育的软肋。

sentences.en: The murder weapon was part of a haul stolen in a raid on a South African air-force arsenal in 1990.
sentences.cn: 1990年南非空军武器库遭到突袭，这件凶器就是当时被盗走的武器中的一件。

sentences.en: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened.
sentences.cn: 除非受恶劣天气干扰，南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

sentences.en: The South African president has negotiated an end to white-minority rule.
sentences.cn: 南非总统已通过谈判达成协议，结束了少数白人的统治。

sentences.en: The South African years were his most creative period.
sentences.cn: 在南非的那些年是他创作最旺盛的时期。

sentences.en: The West African forces went on the offensive in response to attacks on them.
sentences.cn: 西非部队对袭击者展开全力还击。

sentences.en: This wine highlights the quality and value for money of South African wines.
sentences.cn: 这种酒突出显示了南非产葡萄酒优异的性价比。

sentences.en: Zidane has become the poster child for a whole generation of French-born youths of North African extraction.
sentences.cn: 齐达内已成为在法国出生、有着北非血统的年轻一代的典范。

phrases.tran_cn: 非裔美国人（指美国黑人）；非裔美籍（等于African American）
南非；南非的；南非人；南非人的

trans.tran_cn: 非洲的，非洲人的，（非洲）黑人的，来自非洲的
trans.tran_en: relating to Africa or its people

trans.tran_cn: 非洲人，非洲居民，（非洲）黑人民
